title: Bistro classic steak with peppercorn sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon whole black peppercorns', '2 sirloin or rib eye steaks', 'vegetable oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '5 tablespoons brandy', '4 tablespoons demi-glaze or beef stock', '1 handful sliced mushrooms', '120ml double cream', '1/2 tablespoon butter']
